item.title: Muh_Cyberdeck
item.description: Init I first learned about cyberdecks through Shadowrun Returns and thought the concept was pretty cool and found this post which has been moved. That post sent me to r/cyberdecks and the first deck I saw was D10D3’s “Cyberdeck v3” which made me want to make one myself. Now what exactly is a cyberdeck? Well Gibson says “eh fuck it”. (not actually but he did say “… my sense of that a “deck” looked like was extremely low-resolution.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Under Construction I am currently migrating my personal site over here so I can stop getting slashdotted everytime I post about a project and uptime will be closer to 100%. This will be a slow process as I have school and other projects I am working on. Things like the theme and layout are subject to change but I will be committed to keeping it js free.
